detectors.description:
DENARIUSToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#20-27) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#23)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#24)

detectors.description:
DENARIUSToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#42-54) may have integer overflow

	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#50)
	- allowance[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DENARIUSToken.sol#51)
